name: ICARUS: Flight To Olympus
description:
In the Ancient times before gravity was invented man dreamed about soaring high with wings of stolen feathers.

Play as Icarus son of Daedalus flying at three different heights. Avoid crashing into clothes, buildings, and trees to keep your wings intact. Collect the birds that taunt you with flight to improve your own flight. Build up your confidence and aim for the sun!

This game was made as part of an education at The Game Assembly (TGA).
